entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow mixed with freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
